Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameTable

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameTable
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GameTable
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
This is the package's main class, which holds all PlayerBoards and the common elements between them, such as the Resource Market and Card Development Market.
See Also:

    • GameTable

      @Deprecated public GameTable​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> nicknames)
      Deprecated.
      use GameTable(Boolean) instead and add players via addPlayer(String) then call startGame().
      Constructor that creates player, cardLeaderDeck and distributes them
      Parameters:
      nicknames - ArrayList of nicknames chosen by the client(s)

      public void addPlayer​(java.lang.String nickname)

      Parameters:

    • discardDevelopmentCardFromSlot

      public void discardDevelopmentCardFromSlot​(CardDevelopmentType discardType)
      Discard development card from PlayerBoard after a discardAction was drawn from Lorenzo. This method always discards 2 cards of discardType
      Parameters:
      discardType - type of development card

    • activateEndGame

      public void activateEndGame()
      This method should only notify the controller that an EndGame condition has been met.

    • moveFaithTrail

      public void moveFaithTrail​(PlayerBoard player, int steps)
      Calls movePlayer() method in FaithTrail
      Parameters:
      player - to be moved
      steps - number of steps player will be moved forward

    • moveFaithTrailLorenzo

      public void moveFaithTrailLorenzo()

    • moveOthersFaithTrail

    • setupHelper

      public void setupHelper​(int playerIndex, @Nullable @Nullable Resource bonus1, @Nullable @Nullable Resource bonus2)
      THIS METHOD MUST BE CALLED INSIDE THE CONTROLLER, AFTER RECEIVING PLAYER RESOURCE SELECTIONS

      Method to place initial resources and initial advances for players except for the first one.

      Parameters:
      playerIndex - An int the player's position within the game turn order.
      bonus1 - First bonus resource selected by the player, can be null for playerIndex 0 or 1
      bonus2 - Second bonus resource selected by the player, can be null for playerIndex 0 or 1 or 2

    • distributeLeaderCards

      private void distributeLeaderCards()
      Private method to distribute the initial 4 leader cards, which are store in cardLeaderDeck, to the PlayerBoard's cardsLeaderBeforeSelecting array.
